thread.section_title: Hotel du Prince Eugene - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ideal location for us
thread.title_full: Ideal location for us - Review of Hotel du Prince Eugene, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: missyhall
title: Ideal location for us
text:
Smooth check-in with receptionist speaking English. Explained about tax and breakfast.
Room clean, windows that open 2 ways, heating, toiletries, flexible shower cord, kettle, fridge, room safe, Wi-Fi, TV (only 3 English channels). Bed comfortable.
Close to Nation metro/RER station plus many shops, restaurants, patisseries, bus stops etc.
Breakfast is continental only yet a good selection.
Quiet as double glazed. Only disturbance on 2 nights from guests in next room opening/closing room door.
Heated towel rail extremely useful to dry clothes as we both got soaked on day of Paris half marathon.
Free newspaper.
24 hour reception.
